Secondary objective evaluate effect growth 18 month PK profile . At baseline child PTH level > 300 pg/mL , plasma P < 6 mg/dL , Ca 8.4-10.5 mg/dL , Ca x P product > 60 responsive SoC . Initial dose cinacalcet 0.5-0.75 mg/Kg per o OD adjust max 180mg OD target PTH value < 180 pg/mL absence hypocalcemia . Primary study endpoint ( EP ) % child reduction baseline > 25 % mean PTH level 6-mo efficacy-assessment period .
